ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into character so... When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the
ygData.messageBody:
As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into
character so...

When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play: All but weekends

Time of day: After work,school,wife and baby about 11p-2a

Longest stretch of continuous play:28hours(wife and baby went to grandma's house)

Way to have game sounds: Music off, Sound effects high

Distance to sit from display: 1'6" (small desk)

TV show to have on: Whatever sounds good tv is behind me anyway

Music to listen to: Hard Rock

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Sprite

Beverage (alcoholic):Sam Adams

Health Food:Left over dinner stuff

Junk Food:Pizza

Clothes to wear: T and boxers

************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
Pinen
Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
Master Brewer of the NwN(pre-patch)
Bard of the 19th Song
*******************************************************************************************************************
